name: Salted Mint Lassi (Borhani)
description: This herbaceous, savory lassi is the perfect accompaniment to any Indian meal. Just a pinch of chaat masala adds funky and tangy flavor, while black pepper and Kashmiri red chili powder bring the heat.
recipeIngredient: 2 teaspoons (10g) kosher salt; for table salt, use about half as much by volume or the same weight

recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, combine mint, cilantro, and 1/3 cup (78ml) water. Blend until smooth.
In a large mixing bowl, whisk together herb purée, buttermilk, yogurt, chaat masala, black pepper, chili powder, and salt. Adjust with more seasoning if desired.
Serve immediately over ice. The lassi will keep in the refrigerator for three days.
